messages.title: YOUR BRUNSWICK PARK WARD CONSERVATIVE TEAM

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Defend the green belt in Barnet by scrapping Labour's housing targets.
Cut the deficit, to provide the economic stability we need to protect jobs and businesses in Barnet.
Support aspiration by raising the inheritance threshold to £1m, so ordinary families are no longer punished for working hard.

issues.economy: Labour's irresponsible economic policies have given us the biggest boom and bust in history and are now threatening jobs and businesses with more debt, more instability, and higher mortgage rates. We simply can't go on like this.
issues.education: Working hard to drive up standards in schools. Barnet's primary schools are now in the top 10% in the country

housing.content: Defend the green belt in Barnet by scrapping Labour's housing targets.

leaflet.personalStatement: For five years, I have worked hard as your MP, standing up for Chipping Barnet and campaigning on the issues that matter to local people; post office closures, Labour's cuts to our local hospitals, demanding more police on our streets and fighting Labour's higher mortgage rates.

images.caption: Conservative run Barnet Council is working for you
